name: Watch Soccer: Dribble King
description:
Endless soccer game for you play on your Apple Watch or iPhone/iPad.

Once you got your ball, you just can’t stop yourself from dribbling it through all the enemies you meet on the way.
****************
How to play:
* On iPhone or iPad: use virtual controller to move.
* On Apple Watch: tap/drag the screen to change moving direction.
* Your score will be counted based on the number of enemies that you left behind, so don’t get caught.
* Keep ball in the field as long as you can, don't across the red area.
